result.name: end-of-life-vehicles-targets-database
result.notes: A listing of the annual reuse, recycling and recovery target performance achieved by vehicle manufacturers and Authorised Testing Facilities  (ATFs)

organization.name: department-for-business-energy-and-industrial-strategy
organization.title: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
organization.description:
The department brings together responsibilities for business, industrial strategy, science, innovation, energy, and climate change.
We are responsible for:
developing and delivering a comprehensive industrial strategy and leading the government’s relationship with business
ensuring that the country has secure energy supplies that are reliable, affordable and clean
ensuring the UK remains at the leading edge of science, research and innovation
tackling climate change

result.title: End of Life Vehicles targets database

extras.value: BIS regulates the recycling target obligations under the End-of-Life Vehicles (Producer Responsibility) Regulations 2005. This requires obligated businesses to supply annually information relating to the treatment of vehicles they have handled including the overall recycling rate achieved. This information is commercially sensitive and not for publication. Not to be released
